data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Bamingui-Bangoran.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bamingui-Bangoran, Central African Republic

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Bamingui-Bangoran be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Bamingui-Bangoran, Central African Republic.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Bamingui-Bangoran access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Bamingui-Bangoran to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Runga people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Runga people.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Bamingui-Bangoran, Central African Republic a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Bamingui-Bangoran, Central African Republic.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 12,767 believers in the state of Bamingui-Bangoran to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
